project_name.justification: The primary project of interest is Atlanta. The transaction concerns the Silver Park property, which is explicitly described as being 'located within the Atlanta Project boundary'.

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified in the headline and body of the press release: 'Nevada King Gold Corp. (TSXV: NKG) (OTCQX: NKGFF) ("Nevada King" or the "Company") is pleased to announce that the Company has completed the acquisition...'

ceo_buyer.justification: Collin Kettell, Founder and CEO of Nevada King, stated, "Nevada King was formed in 2016 with an aim to assemble a formative land package along the most prolific gold trend in the world's premier mining jurisdiction."

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The transaction is for an option to acquire a full interest: 'The Option Agreement provides that Nevada King may purchase a 100% undivided legal interest in the Property from Ofor Silver...'

primary_commodity.justification: The project is referred to as the 'Atlanta Gold Mine Project' and the resource statement is primarily focused on gold (Au). 'The Atlanta Mine is a historical gold-silver producer with a NI 43-101 compliant pit-constrained resource of 460,000 oz Au...'

verified_article_link.justification: The article titled 'NEVADA KING ANNOUNCES ACQUISITION OF SILVER PARK OPTION IN LINCOLN COUNTY, NEVADA' directly discusses the acquisition of property within the Atlanta Project boundary.

currency.justification: The cash component of the deal is explicitly denominated in US dollars: '...paying Ofor Silver the sum of US$75,000 before July 30, 2034.'

cash_payments_raw.justification: A future cash payment is required to exercise the option: 'The Option Agreement provides that Nevada King may purchase a 100% undivided legal interest in the Property from Ofor Silver by paying Ofor Silver the sum of US$75,000 before July 30, 2034.'

share_payments_raw.justification: The text provides an explicit aggregate value for the shares issued as consideration for the option: '...for aggregate consideration of $41,000.'

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: Per the financial extraction hierarchy, this field is null because separate cash and share payment values were identified and populated in `cash_payments_raw` and `share_payments_raw`.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: Per the financial extraction hierarchy, this field is null because `share_payments_raw` was populated with an explicit aggregate value, which takes priority over populating the number of shares and price per share.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any share warrant payments as part of the transaction.

option_payments_raw.justification: The payment for the option was made in shares, the value of which is captured in the `share_payments_raw` field. There is no separate cash payment specified for the option itself.

issued_share_price.justification: Per the financial extraction hierarchy, this field is null because `share_payments_raw` was populated with an explicit aggregate value, which takes priority over populating the number of shares and price per share.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The text does not mention any exploration commitment in terms of drilling meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The text does not mention any monetary exploration commitment as part of the transaction.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The text does not mention any Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) being acquired or retained as part of this specific transaction.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The acquired property's area is specified: 'Silver Park is located within the Atlanta Project boundary, totals approximately 24 hectares...'

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit for the coverage area is explicitly stated: '...totals approximately 24 hectares...'

resource_size.value: 460,000 oz Au in the measured and indicated category (11.0M tonnes at 1.3 g/t) plus an inferred resource of 142,000 oz Au (5.3M tonnes at 0.83 g/t)
resource_size.justification: The resource for the Atlanta Mine is detailed in the text: 'The Atlanta Mine is a historical gold-silver producer with a NI 43-101 compliant pit-constrained resource of 460,000 oz Au in the measured and indicated category (11.0M tonnes at 1.3 g/t) plus an inferred resource of 142,000 oz Au (5.3M tonnes at 0.83 g/t).'

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer's ticker and exchange are listed in the first line of the press release: 'Nevada King Gold Corp. (TSXV: NKG)'.
